name: Into the Blue (Jam Version)
description:
This game follows Ken and their newfound companion, Claire, as they try to navigate the battered landscape of an alien post-apocalyptic world.

Arrow Keys - Move/Navigate Menu

Space Bar - Jump

Menu  - X

Confirm - Z

I think some of the text might get cut off unless you play it in fullscreen, sorry

This is my entry for Gdevelop's 2nd game jam - themed around pets/companions - I've had these characters in my head for a long time but everything else including the music and all of the assets were created by me in the time span. I had to rush the graphics a little because I used placeholders for EVERYTHING up until there were only 48 hours left OTL not doing that again!!

I didn't quite get where I wanted but I'm really happy with what I did get done - there was going to be an intro cutscene + a cutscene introducing Claire properly to establish the world and the characters a bit more, but I really wanted to focus on gameplay first.

There is also a mechanic I didn't get to explain whatsoever - if one of your party members gets knocked out, you can pick them up with "Z" and haul them back to a checkpoint to revive them!

I might expand on this in future, I have a lot more ideas and a lot that could be polished.
